overview: Collection of three short films from Nova. "The Comeon" — Jeff Hunter sees Chuck Burton working outside and then goes home to fantasize about having sex with him in a Jacuzzi. "Down On The Farm" — They grow 'em bigger down on the farm... much bigger... as this horny city boy learns when he tries to teach his country cousin a few tricks... but ends up learning things even he has never tried before! "Detour" — A detour turns into a hot, hard encounter between a lost driver and a hunky road repairman, going at it in every position imaginable!  A collection of the same name was also released which included the short film "Delivery In Rear" instead of "The Comeon."
title: Down On The Farm
